name: Boiled Egg Chocolate Pudding
instructions: Hard-boil 3 eggs and let them cool completely
Peel the eggs and place in a blender or food processor
Add cocoa powder, sweetener, vanilla extract, and a pinch of salt
Blend on high until completely smooth and creamy (2-3 minutes)
Add milk 1 tablespoon at a time to reach desired pudding consistency
Taste and adjust sweetness if needed
Refrigerate for at least 1 hour to chill and thicken
Top with whipped cream or chocolate shavings if desired
